hard_constraints.description: Each value must belong to exactly one subset.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- C = #count { S : in_set(V, S) }, C != 1, value(V).

hard_constraints.description: Total sum of subset a must equal total sum of subset b.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- Sa = #sum { V : in_set(V, "a") }, Sb = #sum { V : in_set(V, "b") }, Sa != Sb.
